PIONEER EXPERIENCES: A GENERAL QUESTIONNAIRE

NO. 2

SAINTHOMAS ARCHIVES, A GENERAL QUESTIONNAIRE

1. Your full name ................................................................. Henry Clifford

2. Your address ................................................................. 713, Museum Henry Clifford

3. Date ................................................................. May 10th, 1947

4. Where were you born? (Give name of place and country) Riccione, Italy - England

5. What was your father's name and occupation? Henry Clifford

6. When did you come to Saskatchewan? (Give month and year) April 1st, 1903

7. Mention any other places where you lived before coming to Saskatchewan. Dates wherever possible.

8. How old were you when you first came to Western Canada? (You do not need to answer this question if it would rather not or you were "a small child").

9. What were your reasons for coming here?

Reasons for coming & reasons already discussed

- To find work & earn a living
- To escape from poverty & hardship
- To find freedom & liberty
- To find opportunity & prosperity

10. How did you learn about the West? (Through other people? Reading about it?)

11. Have you ever visited the East? (Through other people? Reading about it?)
Messum, Henry Clifford
Lloydminster,
To Sask., March, 1903.
